Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of the bias by accusing Twitter India of targeting adherents of right-wing ideology on social media.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the accusation of selective bias by Twitter India.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the alleged quote by Raheel Khursheed is true without providing substantial proof.
Exist alternative explanation: There is a possibility that the alleged quote attributed to Raheel Khursheed is fake and part of a coordinated social media offensive, as suggested by Alt News.
